nothing can ruin your vacation quite

isn't just in their leaves it's in every

what causes that notorious itchy rash
you get or what doctors call Arushi all
induced contact dermatitis now the

course leaves and such are easily

something else didn't get there first
in fact because who Russia all causes
such a violent rash in people there's
this pervasive idea that the resident
evolved as a defense mechanism against

apparently hamsters but it has no effect

why scientists think it's more likely
that Arushi all evolved as an
antimicrobial it's quite effective
against much smaller plant pests there's

Russia all's antimicrobial and anti

just so happens that
Arushi all is one of those things the
Russia all loaded cells activate the
body's t-cells those
vigilant warriors of the human immune

itch the redness swelling and blisters
all occur because your immune system

course this doesn't really apply to

all at all for some reason Nature has

all induced contact dermatitis is
